name: Creamy Vegetable Soup
description: You will love this creamy vegetable soup! It's super comforting, easy to make, and packed with healthy vegetables and flavor!

recipeInstructions.text: Cut the potatoes and the celeriac into medium-sized cubes (about 1 inch). Cut the carrots into half lengthwise and slice them. Slice the leek into rings.
recipeInstructions.name: Cut the potatoes and the celeriac into medium-sized cubes (about 1 inch). Cut the carrots into half lengthwise and slice them. Slice the leek into rings.

recipeInstructions.text: Heat some oil in a large pot and add the vegetables. Cook for 5 minutes on high heat. Stir a few times.
recipeInstructions.name: Heat some oil in a large pot and add the vegetables. Cook for 5 minutes on high heat. Stir a few times.

recipeInstructions.text: Add the vegetable broth. Cover with a lid and bring to a boil.
recipeInstructions.name: Add the vegetable broth. Cover with a lid and bring to a boil.

recipeInstructions.text: Let it simmer for 15 minutes or until the vegetables are tender.
recipeInstructions.name: Let it simmer for 15 minutes or until the vegetables are tender.

recipeInstructions.text: Scoop out about 1/4 of the soup with a ladle.
recipeInstructions.name: Scoop out about 1/4 of the soup with a ladle.

recipeInstructions.text: Use an immersion blender or a regular blender or food processor to puree it until smooth.
recipeInstructions.name: Use an immersion blender or a regular blender or food processor to puree it until smooth.

recipeInstructions.text: Transfer back to the pot. Add the freshly chopped parsley and season with salt and pepper.
recipeInstructions.name: Transfer back to the pot. Add the freshly chopped parsley and season with salt and pepper.
